title: Some feedback on clubs

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hello,

I just have a small bit of feedback, with a tiny request for usability of clubs. I have attached a picture illustrating the small issue. The issue is that the club chat gets spammed with people logging in and out, instead of being able to see a dialogue of actual chat.

A solution could be as simple as an added option to disable seeing login/logout messages in the club chat.

Thanks for taking the time to read my suggestion,
Anthropic
